title: Chess
description: In Chess, students will see the game pieces come to life and learn a bit about how they do battle. High-frequency words, detailed photographs, and illustrations support readers as they have the opportunity to locate details that support the main idea as well as to ask and answer questions.
reviewWords: battle, bishop, chess, knight, pawn, rook
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
awareness: Consonant Digraph Sounds                : Discriminate consonant digraph /ch/ sound
grammar: Prepositions : Identify and use prepositions in and on
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency word each
